title: Planar Ally
content:
Planar Ally Level 6 Conjuration Spell Beseech one of these otherworldly entities for aid. 18m Action Level 6 Spell Slot

Level 6 Conjuration Spell

Beseech one of these otherworldly entities for aid.

Planar Ally is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Planar Ally is a Lvl 6 Spell from the Conjuration school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Planar Ally Information

Description: Beseech one of these otherworldly entities for aid. Level: Lvl 6 spell School: Conjuration School Casting Time: Action Range: 60ft Requires Concentration: No Saving Throw: None Planar Ally: Cambion Conjure a fiendish cambion to fight alongside you. Powers: Fiendish Charm, Draining Kiss, and Rays of Fire. Planar Ally: Deva Conjure a celestial deva to fight alongside you. Powers: Wrathful Smite, Revivify, and Concussive Smash. Planar Ally: Djinni Conjure a powerful Djinni to fight alongside you. It can cast: Thunderwave, Drunken Inhale Class Actions: Sweetplum Gales, Shifting Winds

How to Acquire Planar Ally

Planar Ally can be acquired by the following classes: Cleric Planar Ally can be cast by using the following Items: Infernal Rapier (can only summon Cambion)
